channel.title: Ftw on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Ftw on Adam Israel

item.title: Finishing Things Weekend
item.description:
This weekend has been declared crunch time, and as it turns out there’s also a Finishing Things Weekend (#FTW) happening on Twitter this weekend. Rockin’. I love peer pressure.

The things that I want/need to get done:

  • Revise last weekend’s flash story (flutters eyelashes atÂ critiquers) and submit it
  • Draft another Tesla’s Daughter Super Hero story (yes, it’s apparently turning into a series)
  • Write new flash fiction for this weekend’s [Codex][1] Weekend Warriors contest

That’s kind of a lot, but I think I can pull it off. No plans other than writing and sleeping.

[1]: http://codexwriters.com/
